categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic units

nodes.text: Slick's squad was a squad of clone troopers was led by Clone Sergeant "Slick" during the Clone Wars. He considered the troopers in his unit the best soldiers of the Grand Army of the Republic. The unit was made up of himself, "Jester," "Gus," "Punch," "Sketch," and "Chopper." Clone Captain CT-7567 "Rex" and Clone Marshal Commander CC-2224 "Cody" suspected that a member of the unit had become a traitor, and they ultimately learned the spy was Slick himself.
